page.title: 17School 3
page.content: We do Physical Education outside in the Summer. We used to do it indoors in the spare classroom in the Winter but we can't at the moment because of a County Safety rule about unprotected glass. For outdoor P.E. we use small apparatus like balls, hoops and ropes, or climbing apparatus in the playground or we play games like netball, football, cricket, rounders, chinese cricket etc. We used to use the climbing apparatus indoors. We have two 'A' frames each five feet high with ladders and benches, and three agility tables for gymnastics. I like using the apparatus best.
